metadata.title: CVE-2012-6616 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The mov_text_decode_frame function in libavcodec/movtextdec.c in FFmpegbefore 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read and crash) via crafted 3GPP TS 26.245 data.

criterions.comment: mythtv package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
